effect_entries.effect: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect_entries.short_effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Steals HP from a
sleeping victim.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
on a sleeping foe
to restore HP.

sleeping victim.
